Data: Classical sociologists.

sociologists.Rd

Data frame with names, birth and death year data, birth country and movement.

data("sociologists")

Format

A data frame with life's period of 16 sociologists and the following 11 variables to study time coincidences:

name

: name and last name of the sociologist.

birth

: birth year.

death

: death year.

birth_place

: birth place.

birth_country

: birth country.

death_place

: death place.

death_country

: death country.

label

: combination of name, birth and death dates.

generation

: generation (every 25 years) of the sociologists.

school

: school of thought.

picture

: name of the file where their picture is.

Source

Own elaboration from manuals of sociology.

References

See events.

Examples

data(sociologists)
head(sociologists, 10)

#>                     name birth death birth_place birth_country death_place
#> 1          Auguste Comte  1798  1857 Montpellier       Francia       Paris
#> 2              Karl Marx  1818  1883       Trier      Alemania      London
#> 3        Herbert Spencer  1820  1903       Derby   Reino Unido    Brighton
#> 4       Friedrich Engels  1820  1895      Barmen      Alemania      London
#> 5  William Graham Sumner  1840  1910  New Jersey          EEUU Connecticut
#> 6        Vilfredo Pareto  1848  1923       Paris       Francia     Céligny
#> 7      Ferdinand Tönnies  1855  1909  Oldenswort      Alemania        Kiel
#> 8       Thorstein Veblen  1857  1929   Wisconsin          EEUU   Palo Alto
#> 9         Émile Durkheim  1858  1917      Épinal       Francia       Paris
#> 10          Georg Simmel  1858  1918      Berlin      Alemania  Strasbourg
#>    death_country                             label generation            school
#> 1        Francia         Auguste Comte (1798-1857)  1775-1799     a) Positivism
#> 2    Reino Unido             Karl Marx (1818-1883)  1800-1824  b) Social action
#> 3    Reino Unido       Herbert Spencer (1820-1903)  1800-1824   c) Evolutionism
#> 4    Reino Unido      Friedrich Engels (1820-1895)  1800-1824  b) Social action
#> 5           EEUU William Graham Sumner (1840-1910)  1825-1850   c) Evolutionism
#> 6          Suiza       Vilfredo Pareto (1848-1923)  1825-1850 d) Socioeconomics
#> 7       Alemania     Ferdinand Tönnies (1855-1909)  1851-1874  b) Social action
#> 8           EEUU      Thorstein Veblen (1857-1929)  1851-1874 d) Socioeconomics
#> 9        Francia        Émile Durkheim (1858-1917)  1851-1874     a) Positivism
#> 10       Francia          Georg Simmel (1858-1918)  1851-1874  b) Social action
#>         picture
